DOC.brief_summary: Infection human papillomavirus ( HPV ) clearly establish necessary cause cervical cancer . The current Phase 3b study design assess immunogenicity safety commercially available vaccine co-administered GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals ' HPV vaccine GSK580299 healthy female subject .
